main: Standard Heishou mechanic: Using S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff corresponding to their Heishou Pack. {status:LegStrengthHorseYisang} gives {status:Agility}, {status:Aggro}, and bonus {status:Vibration} application.
Standard Heishou mechanic: Combos with {identity:10613}'s S3. The buff gives him one {status:VibrationExplosion} per turn when attacking.

Standard Heishou Adept mechanic: Having his passive active lets him generate a resource that can be consumed upgrade his S3. {status:BreakthroughHorse} is gained when attacking slower enemies, triggering {status:VibrationExplosion}, or winning a clash with {status:LegStrengthHorseYisang} (max 3 per turn). He needs 5 stacks to use his S3-2.
other: Both S3 versions (or S2 when the target doesn't have Deathrite) apply {status:ConcussionYisang}, buffing the effects of {status:VibrationExplosion} and {status:Burst} by 20%.
S3-2 applies {status:BattlefieldHorse} to all allies next turn, giving everyone {status:ParryingResultUp} and {status:DefenseUp}.
Passively gives bonus {status:Breath} and {status:Enhancement} to {identity:10812}, as well as triggering her S3 for free whenever he uses his S3-2.

1011401.desc:
Gain 1 [BreakthroughHorse] when meeting one of the following conditions:
- Attack Start: when this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 2 or more
- When this unit triggers [VibrationExplosion] twice with its Skills (including E.G.O Skills)
- When this unit wins a Clash while having [LegStrengthHorseYisang]
※ Only 3 [BreakthroughHorse] can be gained per turn; cannot gain [BreakthroughHorse] with the Skill "Obsidian Stormrider's Crescent Decapitator"
1011401.name: Obsidian Stormrider [黑風馬脚]

1011402.desc:
When activating [HeishouCombo], The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu gains the following effect as the [HeishouComboCountHonglu] effect:
- On Hit with a Base Skill's Final Coin, trigger [VibrationExplosion] once (once per turn)

If Family Hierarch Candidate Ishmael is an Actively participating unit, activate the following:
- When Family Hierarch Candidate Ishmael inflicts [Burst] or [Burst] Count with its Skill effects, that unit gains 3 [Breath] Potency (2 times per turn; excluding E.G.O Skills)
- Turn Start: apply 1 [Enhancement] to Family Hierarch Candidate Ishmael. If Ishmael has 10+ [Breath] Potency, apply 1 more [Enhancement]
- After this unit uses the Skill "Obsidian Stormrider's Crescent Decapitator", Family Hierarch Candidate Ishmael uses "Crimson Spring" as Assist Attack[TabExplain] (once per turn)
1011402.name: The Steed's Houndlike Loyalty [狗馬之心]

1011403.desc:
When applying [BattlefieldHorse], gain 3 [AttackUp] this turn and next turn
(If this unit has already gained [AttackUp] from this passive, gain it only for the next turn)
1011403.name: Adept Vanguard

1011411.desc:
Gain 1 [BreakthroughHorse] when meeting one of the following conditions:
- Attack Start: when this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 2 or more
- When this unit triggers [VibrationExplosion] twice with its Skills (including E.G.O Skills)
- When this unit wins a Clash while having [LegStrengthHorseYisang]
※ Only 3 [BreakthroughHorse] can be gained per turn; cannot gain [BreakthroughHorse] with the Skill "Obsidian Stormrider's Crescent Decapitator"

When this unit has Shield, gain (Shield HP / 10) Defense Level (max 5; rounded down)
1011411.name: Obsidian Stormrider [黑風馬脚]

1011421.desc:
Apply the following effect to 1 ally with the highest max HP
- Combat Start: gain (affected unit's Speed difference between this turn and last turn x 2) Defense Level (max 5; if the affected unit was not an Active participant last turn, use its minimum base Speed value to calculate)
- Combat Start: if the affected unit is at less than 50% HP, and if the Speed difference between this turn and last turn is 3 or higher, heal 50 HP (once per Encounter)
1011421.name: Obsidian exoskeleton shall rend and protect my flesh
